name: Citus Logistics Token
description:
Citus is a comprehensive, AI-enhanced logistics management platform.

Core Features:
- Dashboard with real-time shipment tracking and metrics
- AR Warehouse Visualizer for 3D optimization
- AI Image Recognition for packages/inventory
- Multi-tenant support
- Integration hub for ERP, CRM, and APIs

Advanced:
- Mobile-first with offline sync
- Real-time tracking (vehicles, shipments, employees)
- Route optimization & location management
- Billing/subscription with token-based usage (CLT)
- Secure auth & profiles
- Cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android via Capacitor)

Tech: React + TypeScript, Supabase, AR/3D, AI image processing.
